biotools.summary: Resource for whole-genome epigenetic data sets. Raw data is processed and mapped to genomic coordinates to generate 'tracks' that are a visual representation of the data. These data tracks can be viewed using popular genome browsers or downloaded for local analysis. This resource also provides the user with a unique interface that allows for intuitive browsing and searching of data sets based on biological attributes.

bioschemas.name: NCBI Epigenomics
